name: SuperStar LOONA
description:
When the moon rises in SuperStar, we will be led to resemble each other
LOONA rises upon my hand with SuperStar
Meet SuperStar LOONA now!

New song and new Theme Card of LOONA, updated every week
- All the songs you wanted are here! You can enjoy songs of LOONA
- LOONA, always with a new charm! collect weekly updated Theme Cards!

Play with fans around the world in Weekly League & World Record
- Obtain high scores in Weekly League and aim for a higher tier
- The first place is mine! Compete with international users in World Record

To watch SuperStar exclusive contents of LOONA?
- Meet LOONA in Live Theme, bright like a full moon!
- It's only available in SuperStar, so don't miss out on it
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[Application Permission Usage Notice]
We are requesting for access permissions to provide services as below.
Required Access Permissions
Camera/Storage: For saving the game data in your storage
Read, write on external storage: For saving settings and music data cache
Device ID and phone calls: For tracking and analyzing advertisement records and creating tokens for push notifications
Wi-Fi connection information: For sending guide messages upon downloading additional data
ID: For creating and confirming user accounts


[Access Permission Revoke]
Settings > SuperStar LOONA> Access Agree or Access Revoke

※ Visual Setting
If you experience lags in the game you can change your visual setting to low resolution for better performance.

※ While SuperStar LOONA is available for free, you will get charged upon purchases of certain paid items.

※ If you have any inquiries or require any further information, please contact us at.
E-MAIL: support.superstar.loona@dalcomsoft.com

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

SuperStar LOONA Dalcomsoft Contact Information
Email: support.superstar.loona@dalcomsoft.com
